SELECT SEQ_CNO.CURRVAL FROM DUAL
mapper.update: UPDATE CLUB SET CATEGORY=#{category}, CLUB_TITLE=#{clubTitle}, INTRO=#{intro}, ACTIVITY=#{activity}, WANT=#{want}, NOTWANT=#{notwant}, CLUB_CAPACITY=#{clubCapacity} WHERE CLUB_NO=#{clubNo} AND STATUS='Y'

mapper.insert:

select #{item.clubNo} as REF_CLUB_NO, #{item.clubDate} as CLUB_DATE, #{item.startTime} as START_TIME, #{item.endTime} as END_TIME from dual ) A
mapper.update: UPDATE CLUB SET ONOFF_LINE=#{onoffLine}, TIMES=#{times}, CSTART_DATE=#{clubStartDate}, CEND_DATE=#{clubEndDate}, BK_NAME=#{bkName}, BK_WRITER=#{bkWriter}, BK_PUBLISHER=#{bkPublisher}, CONDITION=2 WHERE CLUB_NO=#{clubNo} AND STATUS='Y'
mapper.select: SELECT HOST_NAME, CLUB_NO, CATEGORY, CLUB_TITLE, ONOFF_LINE, CLUB_CAPACITY, CONDITION, CSTART_DATE, CEND_DATE FROM CLUB WHERE USER_ID=#{userId} AND STATUS='Y' ORDER BY CLUB_NO DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CLUB WHERE STATUS='Y' AND USER_ID = #{userId}

SELECT A.* , B.CHANGE_NAME FROM CLUB A LEFT JOIN CLUB_ATTACHMENT B ON A.CLUB_NO = B.REF_CLUB_NO WHERE A.CONDITION=4 AND A.STATUS='Y' AND TO_CHAR(CSTART_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') <= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_CHAR(CEND_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') > TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND CATEGORY=#{category} AND B.FILE_TYPE=2

SELECT * FROM(SELECT A.* , B.CHANGE_NAME FROM CLUB A LEFT JOIN CLUB_ATTACHMENT B ON A.CLUB_NO = B.REF_CLUB_NO WHERE A.CONDITION=4 AND A.STATUS='Y' AND TO_CHAR(CSTART_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') <= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_CHAR(CEND_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') > TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND B.FILE_TYPE=2 ORDER BY CEND_DATE) WHERE ROWNUM <=6

SELECT * FROM(SELECT A.* , B.CHANGE_NAME FROM CLUB A LEFT JOIN CLUB_ATTACHMENT B ON A.CLUB_NO = B.REF_CLUB_NO WHERE A.CONDITION=4 AND A.STATUS='Y' AND TO_CHAR(CSTART_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') <= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_CHAR(CEND_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') > TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND B.FILE_TYPE=2 ORDER BY HEART_COUNT DESC) WHERE ROWNUM <=12

SELECT A.*, B.*, C.REF_CLUB_NO, C.ORIGINAL_NAME, C.CHANGE_NAME, C.FILE_TYPE FROM CLUB A LEFT JOIN CLUB_TIME B ON A.CLUB_NO = B.REF_CLUB_NO LEFT JOIN CLUB_ATTACHMENT C ON A.CLUB_NO = C.REF_CLUB_NO WHERE A.STATUS='Y' AND A.CLUB_NO=#{cno} ORDER BY B.CLUB_DATE
mapper.update: UPDATE CLUB SET HOST_NAME=#{hostName}, HOST_COMMENT=#{hostComment}, HSTART_DATE=#{hstartDate}, HEND_DATE=#{hendDate}, HWHAT_TODO=#{hwhatTodo} WHERE CLUB_NO=#{clubNo} AND STATUS='Y'
mapper.select: SELECT A.* , B.CHANGE_NAME FROM CLUB A LEFT JOIN CLUB_ATTACHMENT B ON A.CLUB_NO = B.REF_CLUB_NO WHERE CONDITION=5 AND STATUS='Y' AND TO_CHAR(CSTART_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') <= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_CHAR(CEND_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') < TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND CATEGORY=#{category} AND B.FILE_TYPE=2 ORDER BY CSTART_DATE

SELECT * FROM(SELECT B.CLUB_NO, B.CLUB_TITLE, B.CATEGORY, B.HEART_COUNT, C.CHANGE_NAME FROM (SELECT REF_CLUB_NO, SUM(APPLY_COUNT) SUM_APPLY FROM CLUB_TIME GROUP BY REF_CLUB_NO) A JOIN CLUB B ON A.REF_CLUB_NO = B.CLUB_NO JOIN CLUB_ATTACHMENT C ON C.REF_CLUB_NO = B.CLUB_NO WHERE CONDITION=6 AND C.FILE_TYPE=2 AND CATEGORY=#{category} ORDER BY A.SUM_APPLY DESC) WHERE ROWNUM < 6
